author: IGN
description:
Your number one priority in Schedule 1 is to make as much money as possible to grow your empire from the ground up. Given that there are seemingly endless combinations and several ingredients to use to create different effects, getting a grasp on the best recipes both early on and in late game can be a monumental task. Here are the best recipes for both early game and late game in Schedule 1, as well as the most profitable recipes overall to create a thriving empire.

00:00 Intro
01:31 Recipe 1
02:07 Recipe 2
02:34 Recipe 3
03:07 Recipe 4
03:46 Recipe 5
04:14 Recipe 6
05:25 Recipe 7
05:47 Recipe 8
06:40 Recipe 9
07:02 Recipe 10
07:41 Best Mixes in Schedule 1
07:51 Best Mix 1
08:23 Best Mix 2
08:54 Best Mix 3
09:30 Outro

#IGN #Gming #Schedule1
title: Schedule I: The BEST Mixes For Huge Profit! (Beginner to Late-Game)

author: IGN
description:
Blue Prince reviewed on PC, also available on PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X|S.

Blue Prince's complex mysteries weave brilliantly into the careful decision making of how to lay out the mansion’s rooms on each randomized run. The story that slowly emerges within this fascinating place is also a compelling one, and it had me hungrily hunting for clues and combinations for many hours after I reached the credits while also poetically tying into the mechanics that lead you to them. Getting a bad draw you did everything in your power to avoid can frustrate from time to time, but this sprawling estate has so much to uncover that the randomness never stalled my progress for too long. If The Witness, Portal, and Myst are already emblazoned on the Mount Rushmore of first-person puzzle games, I wouldn’t be surprised to see Blue Prince carved alongside them soon enough.
title: Blue Prince Review

author: IGN
description: When Violet accepts an invitation to a private island with some of the world’s most famous social influencers, she expects a weekend of unrivaled viral opportunity. She soon becomes part of her own horrific reality show when the guests are pitted against each other to capture the island’s legendary man-eating dogs before they become victims of the monstrous canines. Hayden Panettiere, Virginia Gardner, and Grace Caroline Currey star in a hilariously harrowing tale of terror.
title: A Breed Apart - Official Red Band Trailer (2025) Hayden Panettiere, Grace Caroline Currey

author: IGN
description:
The Triple-i Initative is showcasing over 35 reveals in their 2025 livestream on Thursday, April 10 at 9am PT / 12pm ET / 6pm CEST. Tune in for world premieres, trailers, gameplay, and much more! 

#IGN #Gaming
title: Triple-i Initiative 2025 Livestream

author: IGN
description:
Rebellions are built on hope. Check out the new Andor teaser trailer for season 2 of the Star Wars series. Andor Season 2 stars Diego Luna, Stellan Skarsgård, Genevieve O’Reilly, Denise Gough, Kyle Soller, Adria Arjona, Alan Tudyk, Faye Marsay, Varada Sethu, Elizabeth Dulau, with Ben Mendelsohn and Forest Whitaker. The three-episode premiere of Andor season 2 streams on Disney+ on April 22, 2025.

The second season of Andor takes place as the horizon of war draws near and Cassian becomes a key player in the Rebel Alliance. Everyone will be tested and, as the stakes rise, the betrayals, sacrifices and conflicting agendas will become profound. Rife with political intrigue and danger, the series is a prequel to “Rogue One: A Star Wars Story,” which portrayed a heroic band of rebels who steal the plans to the Empire’s weapon of mass destruction—The Death Star—setting the stage for the events of the original 1977 film. “Andor” sets the clock back five years from the events of “Rogue One”
title: Andor: Season 2 - Official 'Purpose' Teaser Trailer (2025) Diego Luna, Ben Mendelsohn

author: IGN
title: Here are our picks for the most crucial games of 2025. Presented by @crucial

author: IGN
description:
Watch the latest Days Gone Remastered trailer to see what to expect with the Horde Assault survival arcade mode. Days Gone Remastered will be available on PS5 (PlayStation 5) on April 25, 2025. New content also available on PC as Broken Road DLC on April 25, 2025.

In Horde Assault, challenge your skills as you try to achieve a high score while surviving as long as possible against increased horde sizes and various other enemies, like vicious survivors and evolved Freakers. 

Travel across familiar regions found in the story including the Cascade, Belknap, Lost Lake, and Crater Lake. But be warned, This World Comes For You. Fight your way through a brutal, ever-changing landscape where enemies escalate in difficulty the longer you survive. Move up in level to earn in-mode rewards with never-before-playable characters, new patch cosmetics, and unique Injectors on offer to greatly impact your gameplay experience.
title: Days Gone Remastered - Official Horde Assault Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Red from Angry Birds is now available as a paid character DLC in Super Monkey Ball Banana Rumble. Check out the latest Super Monkey Ball Banana Rumble trailer for the puzzle platformer game to see Red in action. When playing as Red, in-game bananas will turn into feathers, a bunch of bananas will turn into a tuft of feathers, while the gold banana will turn into a glowing feather. Super Monkey Ball Banana Rumble is available now on Nintendo Switch.

#SuperMonkeyBall #AngryBirds #Gaming
title: Super Monkey Ball Banana Rumble - Official Red Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Move with grace, under a veil of darkness. In a moment re-lived, brief as a breath, the dark fiend shall be slain. Learn about Duchess' abilities and see the character in action in this latest Elden Ring Nightreign gameplay trailer for the upcoming standalone cooperative spin-off set in a world parallel to that of 2022’s Elden Ring. Elden Ring Nightreign launches on PS5 (PlayStation 5), PS4 (PlayStation 4), Xbox, and Steam on May 30, 2025.

#EldenRing #EldenRingNightreign #Gaming
title: Elden Ring Nightreign - Official Duchess Gameplay Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Enjoy 11 minutes of exclusive new gameplay from The Outer Worlds 2, the upcoming first-person sci-fi RPG sequel from Obsidian Entertainment. The quest in this video takes you through the N-Ray Facility, where you'll see many of The Outer Worlds 2's new gameplay systems in action.

Keep checking back all April long for more exclusive content from The Outer Worlds 2, as it's our IGN First "cover story" for the month!

#IGN #Gaming
title: The Outer Worlds 2: 11 Minutes of Exclusive Gameplay – IGN First

author: IGN
description:
President Ross extends (Harrison Ford) an apology and an unexpected invitation to Isaiah Bradley (Carl Lumbly) in the deleted scene "Stick Around" from Captain America: Brave New World. 

The Marvel Studios film storms onto digital platforms on April 15, before making its debut on 4K Ultra HD, Blu-ray, and DVD on May 13.

The digital and Blu-ray delivers hours of exclusive bonus content featuring deleted scenes, a gag reel, featurettes, a filmmaker commentary and much more. The 4K UHD will be available in a collectible limited edition SteelBook with custom artwork and packaging.
title: Captain America: Brave New World - Exclusive Deleted Scene (2025) Harrison Ford, Carl Lumbly

author: IGN
description:
Last week during the Switch 2 Nintendo Direct, The Duskbloods was revealed with a slick, vampiric trailer. FromSoftware’s new game is coming exclusively to Nintendo Switch 2 in 2026, and it looks a whole lot like Bloodborne, but unfortunately, fans hoping for another action-RPG soulsborne, FromSoft’s next project is a multiplayer-only PvPvE game, where 8 players fight each other to decide a winner, while also dealing with various NPCs and bosses on the map. It feels a little bit like a monkey paw wish granted to anyone hoping for Bloodborne 2 or a remaster of the original PS4 game, but on the bright side, it’s something new and different, and FromSoftware studio head and Dark Souls, Bloodborne and Elden Ring creator Hidetaka Miyazaki is overseeing The Duskbloods. In addition to being a ridiculously talented game designer, Miyazaki is also very open about the fact that he generally doesn’t like PvP games, so he’s designing one for people like himself. 

How will this pan out? We have
title: The Duskbloods: Yes, It's Multiplayer, But Have Some Faith in Miyazaki

author: IGN
description:
Commandos: Origins reviewed by Luke Reilly on PC. Also available on Xbox Series X|S and PlayStation 5.

"Commandos: Origins strikes a great balance between the classic stealth tactics games and modern streamlined ideas, creating tons of potential for finding creative solutions to problems like “too many living fascists.” Pruning out elements like inventory management may not be to every older fan’s tastes, but that’s focused a spotlight on strict stealth – and it’s here Origins shines. Sneaking through its massive maps, each of which are swarming with hundreds of enemies, takes hours and hours of patient planning and careful clicking. I regularly gleaned a ton of pleasure from executing a perfect coordinated strike and fading away into the background, with the remaining Nazis none the wiser. No plan survives contact with this many bugs, but quick-loading will get you past nearly any issue and this otherwise might be the sneakiest fun you can have going commando with your underwear on
title: Commandos: Origins Review

author: IGN
description:
The first major patch for Assassin's Creed Shadows, Title Update 1.0.2, is now available for PC, Xbox Series X|S, and PS5. This patch brings a variety of bug fixes and balance changes, along with a few quality-of-life improvements. In this video, we'll go over the most important changes to look out for the next time you boot up Assassin's Creed Shadows.

0:00 Intro
0:34 Horse Improvements
1:22 Reset Mastery Node
1:50 Selling and Dismantling Multiple Items
2:09 PS5 Pro Enhancements
2:39 Uncapped Hideout Framerate
3:06 Outro
title: Assassin's Creed Shadows: Biggest Changes in Patch 1.0.2
